fields.project_intro: This is an ecommerce site built for selling vinyls using Stripe payments built with Django. It was styled using a colour scheme based on the 80's Mtv logo.
fields.project_description: The Vinyl Hub is an ecommerce site which offers its users the chance to buy high quality vinyl records, players and accessories. The site has an option for users to register and create an account to unlock special offers and the ability to save their address and delivery details to make the process of purchasing a product more streamlined. It uses Stripe to process payments and uses email verification. The project is just released in phase 1 and in future updates I hope to add in features where you can request a product that is not in stock and also create a forum where users can discuss products or musical topics.
fields.technologies_used: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Python, Bootstrap5, Django, Postgres

fields.project_intro: This is a website that allows registered users to submit reviews of books that they read throughout lockdown to give other users inspiration to read other users recommended books.
fields.project_description: This project was built using with the Flask framework which allowing for easy routing and user authentication, All users can can view all the book reviews but only registered users can leave a review and have the C.R.U.D functionality to edit their review. From a business perspective I had affiliate links at the bottom of the review page to generate income (these aren't activated). The superuser(website owner) has the ability to add ,change delete the genres of books that can be reviewed
fields.technologies_used: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Python, Materialize, Flask, MongoDB

fields.project_intro: This project is built using the functionality JavaScript & jQuery with the design and layout of html and css. Its a memory game with a timer designed for kids.
fields.project_description: This project is a kids memory game which  uses JavaScript and jQuery to run it. It allows the user to check the rules and set the difficulty. The difficulty setting decides how much time you have to solve the puzzle. Depending on whether a player wins or loses a pop up will trigger giving the user options to try again or head back to the main menu or change the difficulty.

fields.project_intro: This is a project for a local Painting Contractor. It's built with html css and bootstrap
fields.project_description: This project is made with HTML5, CSS3 and with the Bootstrap framework. The project was t promote a local painting contractor so the project was to be visually pleasing and also informative. A major focus was to have the contact details available throughout the site and that a contact form is available on the landing page via a bootstrap pop up modal.
